content: here is a third little amigurumi marine animal in this series a yellow tang fish it can be stitched up in less than an hour when stitched with worsted weight yarn and a 4mm hook it comes to 4 inches long 2 5 inches tall and just under 1 inch thick with stuffing it is part of a series of sea life animals that i am creating for a baby mobile other animals include - sea life - octopus /patterns/library/sea-life---octopus - sea life - squid /patterns/library/sea-life---squid - sea life - ochre sea star /patterns/library/sea-life---ochre-sea-star - sea life - jellies /patterns/library/sea-life---jellies - sea life - blue chromis /patterns/library/sea-life---blue-chromis
